# deckgo-hr



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                  | Description                                             |
| --------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--hr-color`          | color @default #6e6d6f                                  |
| `--hr-font-size`      | font size of the hr :before content @default 1.6rem     |
| `--hr-height`         | height of the component @default 4em                    |
| `--hr-letter-spacing` | letter spacing of the hr :before content @default 0.6em |
| `--hr-margin-left`    | margin-left of the hr :before @default 0.6em            |
| `--hr-margin-top`     | margin-top of the hr :before @default -0.25em           |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
